scripts.build: npm --prefix ./traffic-light-v2 run build && npm --prefix ./tic-tac-toe run build && npm --prefix ./voice2post run build && npm --prefix ./react-testing-suite run build-deploy && npm ci && npm run gulp-task
scripts.build-dev: npm --prefix ./traffic-light-v2 run build && npm --prefix ./tic-tac-toe run build && npm --prefix ./voice2post run build && npm --prefix ./react-testing-suite run build-deploy && npm ci && npm run gulp-task && npm run start
